description:
Like all other teenagers, Daisuke is feeling the first twinges of love. One of the girls, Risa, in his class has captivated his heart and mind. He wants nothing more than to be the object of her affection.
Daisuke is well liked at school and in his home town. He feels that he is awkward and clumsy. He resides with his eccentric mother and grandfather, who transform their home into a training ground to prepare Daisuke for his destiny.
Unlike other teenagers Daisuke must deal with an inherited family secret. All the males in the Niwa family have a gene that matures on the fourteenth birthday and is activated with feelings of love. For generations members of his family have transformed into the fabled thief, Phantom Dark. Once Dark has been introduced, Daisuke must share his existence with this darker, legendary aspect of his family tradition.
name: Niwa Daisuke
